name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who belongs to the WebtrES club. With its orange box and classic arms and legs, Volt stands out among other robots. Its classic screen displays intricate waveforms and signals with precision. What sets Volt apart is its stylish glasses addon, giving it a unique and intellectual appearance. As a member of the WebtrES club, Volt is skilled in various technological tasks and is always ready to assist others in the digital realm.
